Our Company

About Evans Peptides

Evans Peptides is a leading provider of high-quality research peptides for scientific and laboratory use. Founded with a commitment to advancing research capabilities, we specialize in supplying peptides that meet the rigorous standards required by researchers and institutions worldwide.

Our Mission

Our mission is to support scientific advancement by providing researchers with access to premium-grade peptides for laboratory and research applications. We are dedicated to:

  • Delivering consistent, high-quality research chemicals
  • Maintaining strict quality control standards
  • Providing exceptional customer service and support
  • Ensuring compliance with all applicable regulations
  • Supporting the scientific research community

Quality Assurance

Quality is at the heart of everything we do. Our products undergo rigorous testing and quality control measures to ensure:

  • High purity levels (typically ‚â•98%)
  • Accurate peptide sequences
  • Proper storage and handling throughout the supply chain
  • Comprehensive documentation and certificates of analysis
  • Consistent batch-to-batch reliability

Research Applications

Our peptides are used in various research fields, including:

  • Biochemistry and molecular biology
  • Pharmaceutical research and development
  • Cellular and tissue studies
  • Protein interaction studies
  • Academic and institutional research

Important: All our products are strictly for laboratory research and in vitro testing only. They are not intended for human consumption, therapeutic use, or veterinary applications.

Our Values

  • Integrity: We conduct business with honesty and transparency
  • Quality: We never compromise on product quality or standards
  • Compliance: We strictly adhere to all regulatory requirements
  • Customer Focus: We prioritize customer needs and satisfaction
  • Scientific Advancement: We support the research community's goals

Regulatory Compliance

Evans Peptides operates in full compliance with federal and state regulations governing the sale and distribution of research chemicals. We:

  • Verify customer qualifications for research chemical purchases
  • Maintain proper documentation and record-keeping
  • Ensure products are clearly labeled for research use only
  • Comply with shipping and handling regulations
  • Stay current with evolving regulatory requirements

Product Catalog

We offer a comprehensive selection of research peptides, including:

  • Growth hormone peptides
  • Performance research peptides
  • Metabolic research compounds
  • Cognitive research peptides
  • And many more for various research applications

Visit our product catalog to browse our full selection.
